title: Seattle City Council Transportation & Utilities Committee 8/18/21
description:
View the City of Seattle's commenting policy: seattle.gov/online-comment-policy

In-person attendance is currently prohibited per Washington State Governor's Proclamation 20-28, et. seq., until the COVID-19 State of Emergency is terminated or Proclamation 20-28 is rescinded by the Governor or State legislature. Meeting participation is limited to access by telephone conference line and online by the Seattle Channel.
Agenda: Call To Order, Approval of the Agenda; Public Comment; Res 32016: relating to the University of Washington Husky Stadium Transportation Management Plan; Reappointments to Seattle Freight Advisory Board, Seattle Bicycle Advisory Board, Seattle Transit Advisory Board; CB 120138: relating to the Terminal 5 Quiet Zone Improvements project; CB 120159: relating to grant funds from the United States Department of Transportation and other non-City sources; CB 120160: relating to the City Light Department - Renewable Plus Program; CB 120128: relating to drainage services of Seattle Public Utilities; CB 120129: relating to wastewater services of Seattle Public Utilities; CB 120130:  relating to rates and charges for water services of Seattle Public Utilities.
